==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|軽|裘|肥|馬}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja}}: [[軽裘肥馬]]

===Idiom===
{{ja-pos|idiom|けいきゅうひば}}

# To be clothed in furs and ride in a carriage drawn by well fed horses. That is, the outfit in which rich people dress when they go out.
